name: Sans VS Flowey
description:
Sans VS Flowey

The author of the game: Peyko Michael

This is a fan game for Undertale.
Plot: Sans the skeleton falls into the Multiverse, which was created by the evil flower Flowey. Sans is waiting for a lot of traps and tricky puzzles. Sans needs to find a way out of the Multiverse so that he can return to his home.

Controls:

Arrows right/left - movement

Arrow up - jump

Space (in intro and game over screen only) - select
